name: Stalowy's Mazmorra Quest
description:
It Was a normal spanish class, nothing special... or so he thought.. Can you overcome this mysterious tunnel of riddles? A strange occurrence has happened in staloway's spanish class, he's been transported to a strange place and lost all of his memories! Help Staloway and his students escape!

Platform your way through caves and cavers full of riddles, meet the students and attempt to the portal's home!

-Note- When  you type something into the chat you have to touch the person for it to register you saying it, (currently you can only say hola) and for the quizzes once you have typed your answer (every answer is only 1 word) you have to touch the stone tablet for 1-2 seconds to continue, also each quiz answer is split up and hidden around the level if you need help.

Controls: Move = jump the arrow key is SPACEBAR and use the white box at the bottom right of your screen to type your awnings. -Note- all canopies are individual words.
